Articles.Content:
the game wont run but i narrowed it down and it would be great if someone told me an in depth way to change ksp to 32 bit without opening the game

thanks.
Could you be a little more descriptive? I'm not really sure what you're asking. Typically, the game will run in 32-bit mode unless you specifically opt to run the KSP_x64.exe.

We have no idea what you are doing to start the game bpsbandit, or why you assume it's on 64bit when the default is 32 unless you are clicking the KSPx64.exe

And if you are doing that, maybe, don't?

its just that i have been told at the steam forums that his was the case but i guess not. anyway like i said the game won't run and it isn't because of my computer being out of date and it cant be helped by redownloading so if you have an idea of what it is that would be great.
